DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 19 24 kg/m^2， inclusive， total body weight least 50 kg ; Clinically relevant abnormality physical examination , laboratory value , vital sign ECG finding screen , judge Investigator Have medical abnormality ( cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , immunologic , hematological , hormonal , metabolic , neoplasmatic mental disease ) , opinion investigator , might affect absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion study drug , prevent patient follow complete protocol Family history diabetes , thyroid cancer , submandibular gland cancer , history pancreatitis , cholelithiasis , drug allergy , serious unconscious hypoglycemia Hepatitis B surface antigen , Hepatitis C antibody HIV ( human immunodeficiency virus ) antibodies positive History drug alcohol abuse within 6 month randomization Use GLP1 analogue , DPPIV enzyme inhibitor , well hypoglycemic drug within 3 month randomization Use prescription drug Chinese herbal medicine within 4 week randomization Use non prescription drug food supplement ( vitamin , etc . ) within 2 week randomization Participated drug clinical trial within 3 month , participate 3 3 drug clinical trial near year , blood donation/loss > 400mL within 3 month Female subject childbearing potential use acceptable method birth control , pregnant planning pregnancy , breastfeeding , male subject use acceptable method birth control , within six month randomization Subject refrain smoking , eat and/or drink contain xanthine/caffeine , strenuous exercise , others affect drug absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion within 2 day study drug administration Subject unsuitable inclusion study opinion investigator
